channel.title: BUbreakingHeadlines
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUbreakingHeadlines, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.description: Everything we know about the U.S. cardinal elected Pope Leo XIV; Reporter's Notebook: Shared hope for the new pope

item.title: Chicago reacts to the election of the city's own Pope Leo XIV
item.description: When news broke Thursday about Robert Prevost's election as the first American pontiff, Pope Leo XIV, the mood throughout Chicago was joyous.

item.title: Almost 60 cases dropped due to corruption in an Alabama police department
item.description: Almost five dozen criminal cases will no longer be prosecuted because they were tainted by rampant corruption in a northern Alabama police department.

item.title: Conclave elects Pope Leo XIV as first American to lead the Catholic Church | Special Report

item.title: Jewish jeweler hospitalized after axe attack in Tunisia
item.description: The Jewish owner of a jewelry store in Tunisia was hospitalized Thursday after an axe attack on the island where Africa’s oldest synagogue is located

item.title: WATCH: Why cardinals chose Pope Leo XIV

item.title: Trump admin live updates: Trump fires Librarian of Congress Carla Hayden
item.description: Librarian of Congress Carla Hayden was notified of her termination by an email from the White House Office of Personnel Management.

item.title: Trump fires longtime Librarian of Congress Carla Hayden
item.description: Carla Hayden has been the Librarian of Congress since 2016. She was the first woman and African American to hold the position.

item.title: Trump appoints Fox News host Jeanine Pirro as top prosecutor in DC
item.description: President Donald Trump said he is appointing Fox News host and ex-prosecutor Jeanine Pirro as interim U.S. attorney for the District of Columbia.
